name: DICE DELVER
description:
You have been invited party.                                                                                                                        You do not like this party, so you pull out your favourite board game.                           DICE DELVER

Roll big, and defeat enemies with said big Rolls

Kick Combos Yield better luck.

DICE DELVER is a high roller                                                                                                            designed for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls

WASD =  for Movement

Q+E = To Zoom in and out of Meta World

Space =   Kick

Shift = Slide

Left Click = Spawn Dice

Right Click = Return Dice/Use Roll

Due to an issue with the map generation some walls are fake.

Created by Team "This is our future"

   

"This is our future" is...
